item.title: 1.20 Factions Rules Guide
item.author: invalid@example.com (Yanique1)
item.dc:creator: Yanique1
item.content:encoded:
Factions Rules Explanations

This post outlines the rules for the Factions game mode. Every specific Factions-related rule for the 1.20.X game mode will be explained in great detail so that players may familiarize themselves with how to play this game mode according to the set guidelines and rules imposed by Team Factions.​

Strikes Punishments
  • 2 Strikes - 10% value reduction
  • 3 Strikes - 12-hour raid ban
  • 4...

Read more

item.title: 1.20 Classic Factions big no no.
item.author: invalid@example.com (OhRevoo)
item.dc:creator: OhRevoo
item.content:encoded:
From a perspective of someone who played Classic Factions regularly even when it was dead i think this reset will flop even worse than the last one.

1.20 version with 1.8 combat is just weird ( Yes it maybe is "Something new and refreshing" but still i'm not a big fan of it)

no Gkits so all this time people who grinded for Gkits or had them won't be able to use them.

half of people i know don't have a pc good enough to play 1.20 (performance wise) with no problems (this will be a big...

Read more

item.title: Please bring back factions!
item.author: invalid@example.com (NachosDemon)
item.dc:creator: NachosDemon
item.content:encoded: Lots of people need a place to play regular factions, and I'm not talking about op factions with 10 mans. We want 20+ mans with regular custom enchants and a good cannon jar! Please bring this back!
